name: Candy Madness (WonderBug)
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

You have to collect all the candies to complete the level.

<A, D> - Movement.

<SPACE> - Jump, actions in the main menu and credits.

<E> - Open the door after collecting all the candies, the action button in the pause menu.

<ESCAPE> - Open the pause menu.

ENEMIES:

- The first type: the speed is normal and the color is red.

- The second type: the speed is fast and the color is green.

- The third type: the speed is slow and the color is yellow.
